txt.en: Darik can be found in the fields of Lebennin to the east of Ethillorn.\n\nYou have encountered the hale Corsair, Darik, and should defeat him.
Although his ill deeds against the people of Lebennin cannot be undone, you have done well to defeat Darik. The people of Lebennin offer you their thanks.
Shirking his duties since sacking Ethillorn, Darik was responsible for the death and enslavement of many folk of Lebennin.

While exploring the plains of Lebennin, you have encountered Darik, a ruthless Corsair captain. Shirking his duties in Ethillorn, he has instead chosen to wander the nearby fields.\n\nThe people of Lebennin would be grateful for vengeance against the invaders in Ethillorn, especially that of their leader. You should defeat Darik before he is able to return to his men.
Darik can be found in the fields of Lebennin to the east of Ethillorn.\n\nYou have encountered the hale Corsair, Darik, and should defeat him.
